backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, public/private messages, permissions, and opt‑in privacy‑preserving learning with anonymized signals.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of all major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme definitions with OKLCH colors, dark mode defaults, and base layout styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting Persian language and RTL direction for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing authentication, profile setup, theme, and navigation between all core pages.
Wrapper component that checks admin permissions and blocks access with an error state if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login gateway showing Persian-themed sign‑in UI and initiating Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling authentication, cache clearing, and query invalidation with Persian UI text.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users to enter and save their display name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Header showing login button, optional username greeting, and brand logo/title.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message input with send button handling sending state, enter-to-send, and connection indicators.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders chat messages with user/bot styling, timestamps, and identity-based alignment.
frontend/src/components/chat/HeartbeatPi: Displays pipeline step statuses with icons, progress states, and optional dismissal.
frontend/src/components/chat/PrivacyPres: Toggle card for enabling or disabling privacy-preserving learning via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/external-knowled: Fetches and displays Wikipedia summaries with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation, content area, and footer; adapts items for admins.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors, refreshing queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReadiness.ts: Determines actor readiness status based on identity and actor loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, messages, FAQ actions, and admin checks, wiring them to actor methods with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWikipediaSummary.t: Provides a query hook that searches Wikipedia and returns a page summary for a given user query.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines CSS variables for dark and light themes, including colors for UI elements and charts.
frontend/src/lib/mamaBrain.ts: Implements deterministic empathetic response generation with Persian normalization and structures for Mama AI responses and feedback.
frontend/src/lib/mamaPipeline.ts: Runs a deterministic multi-step pipeline for message processing, including keyboard correction, FAQ lookup, emotional analysis, and response selection.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFaqImportP: Provides an admin interface to batch‑import FAQ items from JSON. Processes entries in small batches with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements the main chat interface, handling message sending, pipeline execution, authentication checks, and UI state for private/public chat.
frontend/src/pages/MamaBrainPage.tsx: Renders a page describing the Mama Brain architecture with seven modules and a story section. Uses cards and icons to display module details and decorative background imagery.
frontend/src/pages/TransparencyPage.tsx: Shows transparency dashboard with chat statistics and recent public messages. Fetches counts and messages via hooks and refreshes data on demand.
frontend/src/utils/chatErrors.ts: Classifies errors into types and generates safe user‑friendly messages. Also creates sanitized debug logs without sensitive fields.
frontend/src/utils/perf.ts: Adds development‑only performance timers for async and sync functions. Includes a PerfTimer class for manual timing and logging.
frontend/src/utils/persianKeyboardCorrec: Detects Persian typed with an English keyboard and converts characters using a mapping. Returns corrected text with a flag indicating changes.
frontend/src/utils/persianText.ts: Normalizes Persian text spacing and punctuation, enforces a Mama prefix, and sanitizes prompts. Includes ZWNJ rules for common patterns.
frontend/src/utils/privacyPreservingSign: Generates anonymized aggregate signals from normalized messages using keyword categories and length buckets. No raw text is returned.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and persist or clear parameters as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors/fonts/animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s overall design, architecture notes, requirements, issues, and versioned features for the Persian AI chatbot Mama.
